get.summary: Retrieve information with all Catalogues and present them with page restrictions (number of catalogues per page
get.description: When accessing endpoints that returns a collection of records such as this, one as the possibility of setting parameters that can narrow the number of results. This can be achieved with the help of filters or selected fields. Which means, that all json content that is not selected is removed.Moreover, is the possibility of sorting results and restrict the end result using pagination parameters.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Set Page index. Starts in index 0

parameters.name: page-size
parameters.description: Set Number of records per page

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Set sorting fields. Set signal before each field (+) for ASC and (-) for DESC

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: Set valid filters for narrowing end results

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Set valid fields for narrowing json payload

200.description: Response without errors, but may be empty.

400.description: The request was invalid. Occurs when invalid filters, fields or values are used.

404.description: No record found – There is no resource behind the URI.

500.description: Internal Server Error. Occurs when something went terribly wrong.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: string with whitelisted fields for selection

400.description: The request was invalid. Occurs when invalid fields or values are used.
